price: 6. Waxaana idiinku sugan (xoolaha) qurux markaad u soo celinaysaan galabnimada (guriga)iyo markaad u foofinaysaan daaqa.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
